page.title: 04Home life in Cowlinge
page.content: As this is a rural area, the nearest town being seven miles away, it helps to be contented with village life. A lot of time is spent gardening. Flower gardens are well kept, and any excess vegetables are shared around. Electricity is mainly used for cooking, but bottled gas or solid fuel is also used. Three meals a day, meat and two vegetables, for the main meal.Microwave ovens and freezers aid cooking. Home baking, preserving and wine making are all popular, as is weekend entertaining of family and friends.Dress making,'do it yourself' building, and a variety of hobbies are undertaken. Home safety is generally good, but many house contents and furnishings are non-fire resistant. Most houses have pets. A dog is used as a guard dog for many homes.
